extendedInfo.description: The new revamped Super StarÂ® Rewards, formerly Happy Star Rewards has been completely overhauled. Super StarÂ® Rewards now features a streamlined check-in process that allows you to check-in to any Carl's Jr. or Hardee's across the country. Each check-in earns you points that you can redeem on the spot for Carl's Jr./Hardee's products or you can save your points for a high value Carl's Jr./Hardee's reward. Updated Features:â¢	Carl's Jr./Hardee's Menu has been optimizedâ¢	Store locator has been updated and refreshedâ¢	A new point system and rewards section.â¢	Manage and edit your profile.

reviews.title: Hardees
reviews.comment: The best in fast food!
reviews.author: Thad Ragan

reviews.title: RAZR Maxx
reviews.comment: I only gave 3 stars because it crashes my husbands Bionic.  Otherwise easy to use and nice rewards.
reviews.author: Sharlene M

reviews.comment: Winner! Only issue is the GPS is inaccurate.  Half the time I am sitting in the drive through and the program thinks that I am not close enough.\tHas been paying off with coupons steadily.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very bad gps
reviews.comment: Gps out of target, and rewards center out of line
reviews.author: Pedro Rodriguez

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: That six dollar burger tho
reviews.author: Ivan Diaz

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: I get points every time I go there and pretty good rewards to keep me coming back. I wish more businesses did this.
reviews.author: RUBEN MENDOZA

reviews.title: Needs a variety of rewards.
reviews.comment: There isn\'t enough variety for the rewards it is very limited to things that I don\'t even like.
reviews.author: Jonny Martz

reviews.title: Picky about location
reviews.comment: Makes me retry a few times to get GPS to show near enough to restaurant even while in drive through lane right next to building
reviews.author: Randy Drinkard

reviews.title: The app is good, but needs more updates
reviews.comment: I really enjoy the latest version of this application. Having the ability to choose what you want to use your rewards points on is a very nice idea. However, they really need to work on updating the reward items.  I am NOT a fan of beef or starch due to my diet restrictions. 90 percent of the items on the rewards are limited to hamburgers and french fries,. There are only two items that have chicken.  Drastically missing from t What would be wrong with a dollar off coupon for a chicken salad or a milkshake?
reviews.author: Larry James

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: 19Mbs seems a little big for this app, needs an option to move to a SD card but other than that a good app
reviews.author: Chadwick Williams

reviews.comment: The Carl\'s Jr near me does not have coupon codes in their cash register.\tBeen trying to redeem points and losing them because codes are not programmed into their cash register . Would give negative points waste of time
reviews.author: John Crossan

reviews.comment: I allways love CJ. I never had problems.
reviews.author: Chandralal Gunaratne

reviews.title: Good Rewards System, Location Discovery Bad
reviews.comment: A different rewards system from the previous version. Kinda miss the spin wheel, but nice to be able to earn points with each visit. Location discovery requires GPS to be turned on. Does not work using WiFi location, even when using the WiFi IN the restaurant. This needs to be fixed for it to be a better app.
reviews.author: Jeff Rodrigo

reviews.title: Free food? Cool
reviews.comment: My cell gets me free burgers.
reviews.author: mikael holmes

reviews.title: Using rewards
reviews.comment: The local store doesn\'t know how to redeem the rewards. So useless.
reviews.author: Curtis Hupton

reviews.title: So far it\'s looking bad
reviews.comment: Went to a Carl\'s jr, got my meal dine in and tried to check in. Next thing you know it says no Carl\'s jr detected nearby... Huh? GPS needs updating on this app. Until this bug is fixed 2 star rating. And if you can add a way to get coupons in this app I\'ll rate it a 5. I\'m tired of having the papered coupons to carry around, not lazy just don\'t want to stuff my wallet our pockets with coupons.
reviews.author: Carlos Bonilla

reviews.title: Fantastic.
reviews.comment: I love the rewards system, it would be awesome to have more free food item rewards available, but it\'s also nice to have the menu at hand. Wonderful app, and wonderful food.  I go to Hardee\'s quite often now.
reviews.author: Shane P

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Free food and discounts for just checking in, wow! Love this app.
reviews.author: Tim Simpson

reviews.title: Update made it worse!
reviews.comment: Most of the time it doesn\'t work!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty useful when it works
reviews.comment: The GPS sometines doesn\'t register when you are at a store. Also, employees seem unaware of how to process rewards. The tweet for sharing redeemed rewards is too long, and doesn\'t award points. This app could be better and does have sone flaws, but when it works it is worth it.
reviews.author: William Dowdy
